analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x4c0fbe1bb46612915e7967d2c3213cd4d87257ad.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x4c0fbe1bb46612915e7967d2c3213cd4d87257ad.sol#675-678)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
